thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Texas Roadhouse Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.76

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Texas Roadhouse Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.76
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Texas Roadhouse Inc:
* TEXAS ROADHOUSE, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.76 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.76 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 4.9 PCT AT COMPANY RESTAURANTS AND 3.9 PCT AT DOMESTIC FRANCHISE RESTAURANTS
* SEES 2018 TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF APPROXIMATELY $165.0 MILLION TO $175.0 MILLION
* SEES POSITIVE COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES GROWTH FOR 2018
* SEES POSITIVE COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES GROWTH FOR 2018
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $ 627.7 MILLION, UP 10.6 PCT * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $626.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
